name: MEC Wet Coast Waterproof Wide Brim Hat - Unisex
categories: Wet Coast Waterproof Wide Brim Hat
description:
The West Coast didn't get it's nickname for no reason... Pull on this wide brim hat for protection against unpredictable weather. The fully waterproof fabric and shaped brim keep water away from your head while you brave showers or downpours.Highly breathable 2.5 layer waterproof material with a DWR finish to protect you from the rain.Fully taped seams prevent water from seeping in.Polyester mesh lining wicks moisture away from your head.Adjustable buckle and webbing fine-tunes the fit.

        Sustainability
